name: Family Walk, Lodge Park and Sherborne Park Estate

ai.summary: A family-friendly 8.4 km loop through Lodge Park and Sherborne Park Estate in the UK. This moderate route blends woodland paths with open parkland, offering gentle elevation changes, historic estates, and pleasant views suitable for walkers of most ages.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly smooth gravel and compacted paths through woodland and parkland. Some sections are grassy and uneven near estate grounds. Expect occasional roots and damp patches after rain.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on marked paths and respect private property and gates. Be prepared for uneven ground, muddy sections after rain, and variable UK weather. Keep children and dogs supervised, and close gates behind you. Watch for cyclists and wildlife; bring a map or device to avoid getting lost.
recommended_gear: Snack and small first aid kit
Map, GPS, or fully charged phone
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly March–October); year-round walking is possible with proper footwear and weather gear.

seo.title: Family Walk: Lodge Park and Sherborne Park Estate – 8.4 km UK Hike
seo.meta_description: Explore an 8.4 km family-friendly hike through Lodge Park and Sherborne Park Estate in the UK. Moderate terrain, woodland and parkland scenery, suitable for all ages.
seo.h1: Family Walk: Lodge Park and Sherborne Park Estate (8.4 km)
